mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travel_commend (travel_id, title, subTitle, coverUrl, sequence, state) VALUES (#{travelId}, #{title}, #{subTitle}, #{coverUrl}, #{sequence}, #{state})
mapper.update: UPDATE travel_commend SET title = #{title}, subTitle = #{subTitle}, coverUrl = #{coverUrl}, sequence = #{sequence}, state = #{state} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE travel_commend SET state = #{state} WHERE travel_id = #{travelId}
mapper.select: SELECT tc.id, tc.travel_id, tc.title, tc.subTitle, tc.coverUrl, tc.sequence, tc.state, t.id t_id, t.title t_title, t.releaseTime t_releaseTime, t.travelTime t_travelTime FROM travel_commend tc LEFT JOIN travel t ON t.id = tc.travel_id WHERE tc.id = #{id}

SELECT tc.id, tc.travel_id, tc.title, tc.subTitle, tc.coverUrl, tc.sequence, tc.state, t.id t_id, t.title t_title, t.releaseTime t_releaseTime, t.travelTime t_travelTime FROM travel_commend tc LEFT JOIN travel t ON t.id = tc.travel_id

SELECT tc.id, tc.travel_id, tc.title, tc.subTitle, tc.coverUrl, tc.sequence, tc.state, t.id t_id, t.title t_title, t.releaseTime t_releaseTime, t.travelTime t_travelTime FROM travel_commend tc LEFT JOIN travel t ON t.id = tc.travel_id

SELECT tc.id, tc.travel_id, tc.title, tc.subTitle, tc.coverUrl, tc.sequence, tc.state, t.id t_id, t.title t_title, t.releaseTime t_releaseTime, t.travelTime t_travelTime FROM travel_commend tc LEFT JOIN travel t ON t.id = tc.travel_id ORDER BY tc.sequence DESC LIMIT 0,#{count}
